import React from 'react'; import { Row, Col, Button, FormGroup, FormControl, ControlLabel } from "react-bootstrap"; import "./style2.css" import GoogleLoginButton from "./GoogleLoginButton"; // presentational component, only a stateless function // gets props by destructuring the props object // note that the input fields use the props to render their value attribute const LoginForm = ({ username, password, handleChangeUsername, handleChangePassword, handleSubmit, handleGoogleSignIn, validate, isAuthenticated }) => { return (
); } export default LoginForm;
